thread.title: Daniel Craig gives James Bond persona a break to inspect live minefield in Cyprus | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig gives James Bond persona a break to inspect live minefield in Cyprus | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: The Associated Press
title: Daniel Craig gives James Bond persona a break to inspect live minefield in Cyprus | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
text:
NICOSIA, Cyprus -- British Actor Daniel Craig's globetrotting has brought him to Cyprus -- but not to film any scene as superspy James Bond.
Craig was on Cyprus Tuesday to inspect the United Nations' work to clear minefields, a vestige of conflict that divided this east Mediterranean island along ethnic lines.
The UN said Craig inspected a live minefield now being cleared by a Cambodian demining team.
He also toured the UN-controlled buffer zone that separates an internationally recognized Greek Cypriot south from a breakaway Turkish Cypriot north. Cyprus was split in 1974 when Turkey invaded after a coup by supporters of union with Greece.
The actor's Cyprus trip is his first since being appointed UN Global Advocate for the Elimination of Mines and Explosive Hazards.
Related Stories 'I'm over it': Daniel Craig says he's done being James Bond
